```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(comment = NA, eval = FALSE)

# load packages
packages <- c("bookdown", "blogdown", "knitr")
lapply(packages, function(x) {
  if (!requireNamespace(x)) install.packages(x)
  library(x, character.only = TRUE)
})
```
